Bank

Class Attendant

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bank.Attendant
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cashier, Director, Supervisor

    public abstract class Attendant
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an bank Attendant(Agent). It can be attending a client or not, which means that sometimes will be busy and other times available.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean availability
      The availability of the attendant.
      private Client client
      The client that the agent will attend or is attending.
      private java.lang.String name
      The identification name for the attendant.
      private AgentType type
      Type of attendant.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Attendant(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new attendant with the given name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attendClient(Client client)
      Attend a client, so this agent gets busy and the client is set.
      Client getClient()
      Gets the client who is going to be attended by this agent.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gives the name of the attendant
      AgentType getType()
      Gives the type/role of the attendant
      boolean isAvailable()
      Gets the availability of this attendant.
      void releaseClient()
      Stops attending the client and is now available.
      void setBusy()
      Set the availability of the agent as false which means that is busy.
      void setType(AgentType type)
      Set the type of the attendant (agent)

    • Field Detail

      • type

        private AgentType type
        Type of attendant. It is the role of the attendant, it could be a cashier, a supervisor or a director.

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The identification name for the attendant.

      • client

        private Client client
        The client that the agent will attend or is attending.

      • availability

        private boolean availability
        The availability of the attendant.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attendant

        public Attendant(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new attendant with the given name. When it's created the Attendant is available so it does not have a client.
        Parameters:
        name - The identification name for the attendant.

      • setBusy

        public void setBusy()
        Set the availability of the agent as false which means that is busy.

      • getClient

        public Client getClient()
        Gets the client who is going to be attended by this agent.
        Returns:
        the assigned client

      • attendClient

        public void attendClient(Client client)
        Attend a client, so this agent gets busy and the client is set.
        Parameters:
        client - Client who is going to be attended

      • releaseClient

        public void releaseClient()
        Stops attending the client and is now available.
